title: MD APP condoles demise of DG Bulgarian Telegraph Agency
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 16 (APP): Managing Director Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) Dr. Tariq Mahmood Khan Monday condoled the demise of Director General Bulgarian Telegraph Agency (BTA) Maxim Minchev.
In a condolence message, he said Maxim Minchev was a nice person and a thorough professional.
He prayed for the eternal peace of the deceased.
